description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nPharaoh's Bane:
Enemies have 5% less {STAT_attack}, {STAT_intelligence}, {STAT_defense}, and {STAT_speed} for each creature of this creature's own class fighting on your side. This trait does not stack.
name: Zealot Mane
